text:
Coway Engineering provides precision machining & engineering support services to Aerospace, Oil & Gas, and Defence industries.
Founded by local entrepreneurs, with an early vision to provide engineering support services to MRO companies operating in Singapore, we have since expanded and progressed to the manufacturing of Aerospace articles.
Coupled with the experience gained in manufacturing of challenging Oil & Gas articles, Coway is well poised to grow in these industries for the long term.Coway strives to achieve Total Customer Satisfaction through emphasis on Consistent Quality and On-Time Delivery of its products.
The management is committed to comply with the requirements of its Quality Management System and to continuously improve its effectiveness.
